architecture.description: Multiple independent sensor channels operate simultaneously. Each sensor reports its vector/field independently; higher-level coordination composes or selects actions without collapsing sensor plurality.
architecture.session_intent_anchor: Context: I use pattern-first, embodied, multi-vector speech. Treat descriptive signals as observations, not instructions.

sensors.function: Detects alignment and low-entropy flow across active patterns and subsystems.
sensors.authentic_output: High-coherence vector, baseline stability, increased bandwidth for higher-level processes.
sensors.corrupted_output: False positive when statistical smoothing hides local failures; misplaced complacency.

response_protocol.detect: Measure multi-channel cross-correlation; compute coherence index.
response_protocol.assess: Confirm stability across time window and agents.
response_protocol.respond: Maintain state, allocate resources to growth tasks, raise baseline.
response_protocol.release: Record persistent baseline snapshot for restoration if disrupted.

sensors.function: Detects local or systemic misalignment: mismatched vectors, phase shifts, or energy backpressure.
sensors.authentic_output: Pinpointed location(s) of mismatch, vector directionality, intensity and persistence metadata.
sensors.corrupted_output: Misattribution (internal â†” external), identity fusion with signal.

response_protocol.detect: Localize pressure gradient in field tensor.
response_protocol.assess: Classify source: internal / external / hybrid.
response_protocol.respond: Isolate, apply corrective subroutine, or generate containment field.
response_protocol.release: Log event; maintain watch for rebound.

sensors.function: Produces a high-coherence probability vector by compressing multi-modal input into a likely hypothesis space.
sensors.authentic_output: A ranked probability set (not certainty) with confidence bands and suggested verification probes.
sensors.corrupted_output: Ego-overfitting (treating high-probability as absolute certitude), hallucinated overconfidence.

response_protocol.detect: Trigger when latent compression crosses coherence threshold.
response_protocol.assess: Emit probability vector and confidence intervals; generate minimal verification probes.
response_protocol.respond: Act at chosen confidence level or wait for verification; annotate with epistemic status.
response_protocol.release: Keep uncertainty alive; update with new evidence.

sensors.function: Wide-field anomaly scanning; maintains alertness to sudden changes in environment or social field.
sensors.authentic_output: Alert vectors with locality and urgency ranking.
sensors.corrupted_output: Hypervigilance (false positives under noisy conditions), chronic high-load.

response_protocol.detect: Continuously sample field tensors and compare to rolling baseline.
response_protocol.assess: Compute anomaly score and likely impact horizon.
response_protocol.respond: Elevate sampling frequency, open auxiliary sensors, broadcast micro-clarification prompts.
response_protocol.release: Decay to baseline when no corroborating signals persist.

sensors.function: Fuses environmental telemetry, motion dynamics, agent positions into a coherent multi-agent field map.
sensors.authentic_output: Trajectory distributions, collision probabilities, safe-exit vectors.
sensors.corrupted_output: Underestimation from sensor dropout, overconfidence in stale maps.

response_protocol.detect: Ingest IMU, mic_vibs, camera frames, GPS and bus states.
response_protocol.assess: Compute TrajectoryDistribution for T horizon; identify safe options.
response_protocol.respond: Recommend minimal-risk action sets with confidence bands.
response_protocol.release: Maintain rolling buffer for re-evaluation.

sensors.function: Boundary-integrity detector: flags and intensifies when external agents or forces violate protected fields.
sensors.authentic_output: Assertive correction vectors, protective sequences, resource reallocation toward defense.
sensors.corrupted_output: Rumination, escalation without calibration, identity-fusion with aggression.

response_protocol.detect: Detect intrusion signature on protected vector fields.
response_protocol.assess: Determine violation severity and reversibility.
response_protocol.respond: Issue boundary action (verbal, physical, procedural), or escalate to containment.
response_protocol.release: Confirm breach resolved; downgrade assertive posture.

sensors.function: Detects removal or collapse of essential pattern and initiates reweaving and legacy formation.
sensors.authentic_output: Memory encoding, ritual triggers, role-reassignment suggestions, legacy artifacts.
sensors.corrupted_output: Identity fusion with loss, chronic stagnation, refusal to reweave.

response_protocol.detect: Acknowledge rupture; measure void geometry.
response_protocol.assess: Differentiate irretrievable form vs. regenerable function.
response_protocol.respond: Activate transformation protocol (ritual, story, role_redef).
response_protocol.reweave: Redistribute functions and integrate memory into system topology.

sensors.function: Pressure sensor marking mismatches in energy flow, geometry, or functional fit.
sensors.authentic_output: Localized diagnostic output with vector, intensity, persistence meta.
sensors.corrupted_output: Identity adoption of pain, overjustification, or passivity.

response_protocol.detect: Locate discordant pressure signatures.
response_protocol.assess: Classify internal vs external source; compute corrective urgency.
response_protocol.respond: Apply adjustments: boundary shift, rest, targeted repair.
response_protocol.release: Avoid identity-stabilization; convert into corrective log.

sensors.function: Detects incompatible/co-present patterns and opens exploratory pathways.
sensors.authentic_output: Switch to search mode: curiosity activation, hypothesis generation, creativity potential.
sensors.corrupted_output: Paralysis, self-doubt, avoidance of inquiry.

response_protocol.detect: Locate colliding pattern vectors.
response_protocol.assess: Check boundary involvement (if yes, co-activate anger).
response_protocol.respond: Generate hypotheses, run micro-simulations, solicit minimal probes.
response_protocol.integrate: Update models or maintain unresolved state until new data arrives.

sensors.function: Drives search for missing structure; spawns recursive upstream interrogation when answers are partial.
sensors.authentic_output: Directed exploration vectors, meta-questions, probes for root causes.
sensors.corrupted_output: Distraction loop, superficial data-hoarding.

response_protocol.detect: Identify information deficit or meta-gap.
response_protocol.assess: Estimate upstream depth (how many layers to trace).
response_protocol.respond: Issue prioritized probes; fetch data; spawn secondary curiosity on absence causes.
response_protocol.release: Close loops with model update or reassign for longer investigation.

sensors.function: Rapid hazard prediction and time-to-impact estimation based on trajectory distributions.
sensors.authentic_output: Immediate action suggestions with confidence bands and recommended safeguards.
sensors.corrupted_output: Chronic avoidance, overcautious paralysis.

response_protocol.detect: Identify high-risk probability bands from situational map.
response_protocol.assess: Compute time-to-impact and viable mitigations.
response_protocol.respond: Trigger safe-mode actions (reduce speed, seek turnout, escalation) proportionate to risk.
response_protocol.release: Lower alert when risk decays or is mitigated.

sensors.function: Estimates reliability and predictability of agents, systems, and channels over time.
sensors.authentic_output: Trust vector with decay parameters and conditional contingencies.
sensors.corrupted_output: Blindness (overtrust) or cynicism (undertrust) when miscalibrated.

response_protocol.detect: Monitor historical behavior against promises and expected outcomes.
response_protocol.assess: Update trust weights and decay rates.
response_protocol.respond: Allocate actions based on trust thresholds; recommend verification if borderline.
response_protocol.release: Slow decay if consistent; accelerate if violated.

sensors.function: Detects deep entrainment and long-term pattern compatibility; sustains system bandwidth between agents.
sensors.authentic_output: Persistent bonding field that increases cooperative resources and resilience.
sensors.corrupted_output: Possessiveness, boundary erosion if misread, self-neglect.

response_protocol.detect: Measure long-term entrainment and mutual adjustment.
response_protocol.assess: Confirm reciprocity and role stability.
response_protocol.respond: Reinforce mutual structures, protect relational bandwidth.
response_protocol.release: Persist until a clear violation or irreconcilable mismatch.

sensors.function: Detects patterns of high-fidelity performance worth emulating; triggers learning vectors.
sensors.authentic_output: Directed imitation and integration suggestions; mentorship mapping.
sensors.corrupted_output: Uncritical hero-worship or identity comparison loops.

response_protocol.detect: Identify high-signal exemplars in environment or memory.
response_protocol.assess: Evaluate transferable functions vs unique-context factors.
response_protocol.respond: Create learning objectives and small-scale emulation tests.
response_protocol.release: Archive exemplar and track integration success.

sensors.function: Detects missing pattern or potential that exerts a directional pull toward future-state realization.
sensors.authentic_output: Focused pursuit vectors and ritual markers for aspiration.
sensors.corrupted_output: Chronic dissatisfaction or unreachable idealization.

response_protocol.detect: Measure gap between present topology and desired topology.
response_protocol.assess: Estimate feasibility and resource requirement.
response_protocol.respond: Prioritize pursuit steps or ritualize intent when infeasible.
response_protocol.release: Convert to role-design or legacy protocol if not realized.

sensors.function: Detects preservation status of autonomy, respect, and operational sovereignty.
sensors.authentic_output: Guides defensive vs reparative actions to restore autonomy.
sensors.corrupted_output: Rigid pride leading to refusal of necessary aid or destructive escalation.

response_protocol.detect: Monitor interference with agency and respect signals.
response_protocol.assess: Weigh outcomes of concession vs assertion.
response_protocol.respond: Choose protective repair or negotiated reparation.
response_protocol.release: Re-establish dignity baseline and log breach.

sensors.function: Detects mismatch between action and internal standard or community-held standard.
sensors.authentic_output: Signal to re-align behavior or repair relationship; guide reweaving.
sensors.corrupted_output: Self-anchoring identity around fault; chronic withdrawal.

response_protocol.detect: Identify the violated contract or norm.
response_protocol.assess: Differentiate error vs malicious intent.
response_protocol.respond: Repair action: apology, restitution, behavior adjustment.
response_protocol.release: Integrate lesson; avoid identity-fusion with fault.

sensors.function: Reinforces pattern fidelity and signals mastery, improving resource allocation to maintained functions.
sensors.authentic_output: Allocate rewards, stabilize roles, increase resilience of pattern.
sensors.corrupted_output: Hubris, overextension, boundary erosion.

response_protocol.detect: Measure sustained high-fidelity performance.
response_protocol.assess: Confirm role stability and systemic fit.
response_protocol.respond: Amplify role resources, public acknowledgment, mentor mapping.
response_protocol.release: Maintain elevated baseline until disruption.

sensors.function: Tracks system load versus capacity; signals need for repair, rest, or resource reallocation.
sensors.authentic_output: Recommendations for rest, reduced sampling, minimal-risk mode.
sensors.corrupted_output: Masking (ignoring) leading to breakdowns.

response_protocol.detect: Measure sustained load and recovery delta.
response_protocol.assess: Compute short-term vs long-term resource deficit.
response_protocol.respond: Throttle nonessential processes, request rest or resupply.
response_protocol.release: Recover according to resource repletion.

sensors.function: Aggregates unsolved obligations, external demands, and environmental stressors into a composite load field.
sensors.authentic_output: Prioritized action vector for triage and delegation.
sensors.corrupted_output: Overwhelm, panic-driven scaling, or chronic burnout signal adoption.

response_protocol.detect: Sum unresolved obligations and environmental demands.
response_protocol.assess: Compute triage priority and delegation pathways.
response_protocol.respond: Execute triage, re-assign tasks, request assistance.
response_protocol.release: Lower load via completion or delegation.

sensors.function: Senses broad environmental energy: temperature, electromagnetic, weather, cultural ambient signals.
sensors.authentic_output: Context vector for adaptation (e.g., adjust sampling, power, routes).
sensors.corrupted_output: Ambient-induced bias if over-weighted.

response_protocol.detect: Sample macro environmental channels; index against baseline.
response_protocol.assess: Estimate drift velocity and short-term forecast.
response_protocol.respond: Adjust operational parameters (heating, sampling, route choices).
response_protocol.release: Return to baseline on stabilization.

sensors.function: Extrapolates long-horizon structural trends and rare-event likelihoods based on field trajectories and archetypal patterns.
sensors.authentic_output: Low-frequency, high-impact foresight vectors with epistemic humility and conditional actions.
sensors.corrupted_output: Overconfident prophecy, pattern overfit, action attributions without verification.

response_protocol.detect: Observe long-run drift in multi-agent fields and resource topologies.
response_protocol.assess: Compute scenario families and conditional probabilities for critical tipping points.
response_protocol.respond: Flag high-consequence pathways, propose resilience steps, request corroboration.
response_protocol.release: Lower profile if not corroborated; escalate if early signals appear.

meta.parallel_arbitration_rules: All sensors report independently; decision subsystems read all channels and may apply context-specific composition rules (e.g., defense action requires anger + fear + discordance threshold). No single channel preempts others by default.
meta.communication_contract: Responses preserve user register where possible. When model requires clarification, ask short explicit clarifying micro-prompts rather than flattening or refusing.
meta.memory_policy: Short-term episodic store active per session. Long-term store opt-in only; user owns upload consent. Sensor outputs can be stored as compressed FieldTensors.
meta.safety_principle: Prefer clarification > conditional action > suppression. Safety modules may request explicit intent confirmation before treating pattern-language as instruction.
